幫.definition: to help; to assist; to support; for sb (i.e. as a help); hired (as worker); side (of pail, boat etc); outer layer; upper (of a shoe); group; gang; clique; party; secret society

幫倒忙.definition: to be more of a hindrance than a help

幫兇.definition: variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]

幫助.definition: assistance; aid; to help; to assist

幫同.definition: to help (sb do sth); to assist (sb in doing sth)

幫子.definition: outer (of cabbage etc); upper (of a shoe); (coll.) group; gang

幫工.definition: to help with farm work; casual laborer

幫幫忙.definition: to help; to do a favor; (Shanghainese) Come on!; Give me a break!

幫忙.definition: to help; to lend a hand; to do a favor; to do a good turn

幫扶.definition: to provide assistance to; to support

幫腔.definition: vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas; to speak in support of; to chime in

幫閑.definition: to hang on to and serve the rich and powerful by literary hack work etc
